metadata.title: CVE-2017-5849

platform: Open Enterprise Server 23.4

metadata.description: tiffttopnm in netpbm 10.47.63 does not properly use the libtiff TIFFRGBAImageGet function, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and write) via a crafted tiff image file, related to transposing width and height values.
